title: Samuels encounter with Saul. I Sam. chap. 15 from ver. 13 to ver. 30. Preached and penned, by that worthy seruant of God, Mr. Richard Rogers, late preacher of Wetherfield, in Essex. And published word for word, according to this owne coppy, finished before his death
author: Rogers, Richard, 1550?-1618.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Edw. Grifin, for Samuel Man, dwelling in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Swan,
